title: Mixt Greens - Montgomery
typeOfFood: Lacto, American, Buffet, Salad bar, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Quick service salad restaurant with several SF locations (see website). You could build your own salad, or choose from the menu. Uses organic and local ingredients, 100% compostable corn made take-away containers. The space is built with renewable, recycled, and environmentally friendly materials.
